examples.code:
say("hi")
wait(1)
say("bye", 1)

while(true) do
    if(isKeyPressed("space")) then
        say("space is pressed", 1)
    end
    wait()
end

for i=1, 10 do
    moveForward(0.1)
end

while(true) do
    moveForward(0.01)
end

while(true) do
    if(distanceTo("mouse-pointer")<3) then
        say("mouse-pointer")
    else
        say("")
    end
    wait(0.01)
end

myData = {
    {x=1, y=0, z=0, duration=0.5},
    {x=0, y=0, z=1, duration=0.5},
    {x=-1, y=0, z=-1, duration=1},
}
for i, item in ipairs(myData) do
    move(item.x, item.y, item.z, item.duration)
end

run(function()
    say("follow mouse pointer!")
    while(true) do
        if(distanceTo("mouse-pointer") < 7) then
            turnTo("mouse-pointer");
        elseif(distanceTo("@p") > 14) then
            moveTo("@p")
        end
    end
end)
run(function()
    while(true) do
        moveForward(0.02)
    end
end)

say("Press X key to exit")
registerKeyPressedEvent("x", function()
    exit()
end)

say("Press X key to restart")
registerKeyPressedEvent("x", function()
    restart()
end)
local item = ""
local _ = item

_G.a = _G.a or 1
while(true) do
    _G.a = a + 1
    set("a", get("a") + 1)
    say(a)
end

_G.score = 1
_G.msg = "hello"
showVariable("score", "Your Score")
showVariable("msg", "", "#ff0000")
while(true) do
   _G.score = _G.score + 1
   wait(0.01)
end

_G.score = 1
showVariable("score")
wait(1);
hideVariable("score")

examples.desc: Check log.txt or F11 to see the log
examples.code:
log(123)
log("hello")
something = {any="object"}
log(something)

registerCloneEvent(function(msg)
    move(msg or 1, 0, 0, 0.5)
    wait(1)
    delete()
end)
clone()
clone("myself", 2)
clone("myself", 3)

registerClickEvent(function()
    move(1,0,0, 0.5)
end)
clone()
clone()
say("click")

move(1,0)
say("Default actor will be deleted!", 1)
delete()
registerCloneEvent(function()
    say("This clone will be deleted!", 1)
    delete()
end)
for i=1, 100 do
    clone()
    wait(2)
end

registerCloneEvent(function(name)
    setActorValue("name", name)
    moveForward(1);
end)
registerClickEvent(function()
    local myname = getActorValue("name")
    say("my name is "..myname)
end)
setActorValue("name", "Default")
clone("myself", "Cloned")
say("click us!")

registerCloneEvent(function(msg)
    setActorValue("name", msg.name)
    moveForward(msg.dist);
end)
registerClickEvent(function()
    local myname = getActorValue("name")
    say("my name is "..myname)
end)
setActorValue("name", "Default")
clone("myself", {name = "clone1", dist=1})
clone(nil, {name = "clone2", dist=2})
say("click us!")

registerClickEvent(function()
    for i=1, 20 do
        scale(10)
    end
    for i=1, 20 do
        scale(-10)
    end
end)

registerKeyPressedEvent("space",function()
    say("Jump!", 1)
    move(0,1,0, 0.5)
    move(0,-1,0, 0.5)
    walkForward(0)
end)

registerBroadcastEvent("jump", function()
    move(0,1,0)
    wait(1)
    move(0,-1,0)
end)
registerClickEvent(function()
    broadcastAndWait("jump")
    say("That was fun!", 2)
end)
say("click to jump!")

registerBroadcastEvent("hello", function(msg)
    say("hello"..msg)
    move(0,1,0, 0.5)
    move(0,-1,0, 0.5)
    say("bye")
end)
for i=1, 2 do
    broadcast("hello", i)
    wait(0.5)
end

registerBroadcastEvent("hi", function()
    say("hi")
    wait(1)
    say("bye")
    wait(1)
end)
for i=1, 2 do
    broadcastAndWait("hi")
end

cmd("/setblock ~0 ~0 ~1 62")
cmd("/cameradist 12")
cmd("/camerayaw 0")
cmd("/camerapitch 0.5")

say("Jump!", 2)
move(0,1,0)

examples.desc: show dialog on top of character
examples.code:
say("Hello!")
wait(1)
say("")

tip("Start Game in 3!")
wait(1)
tip("Start Game in 2!")
wait(1)
tip("Start Game in 1!")
wait(1)
tip("")

anim(4)
move(-2,0,0,1)
anim(0)

-- 0: standing
-- 4: walking 
-- 5: running
-- check movie block for more ids

play(10, 1000)
say("No looping", 1)

playLoop(10, 1000)
say("Looping", 3)
stop()

playSpeed(4)
playLoop(0, 1000)
say("Looping", 3)
playSpeed(1)
stop()

playLoop(10, 1000)
wait(2)
stop()
turn(15)
playLoop(10, 1000)
wait(2)
stop()

scale(50)
wait(1)
scale(-50)

for i=1, 20 do
    scale(10)
end
scaleTo(50)
wait(0.5)
scaleTo(200)
wait(0.5)
scaleTo(100)

focus()
moveForward(2,2)
focus("player")

for i=1, 100 do
    camera(10+i*0.1, nil, nil)
    wait(0.05)
end

while(true) do
    if(getScale() >= 200) then
        scaleTo(100)
    else
        scale(10)
    end
end

playLoop(10, 2000)
while(true) do
    if(getPlayTime() > 1000) then
        say("hi")
    else
        say("")
    end
    wait(0.01);
end

turn(30);
for i=1, 20 do
    moveForward(0.05)
end

turnTo(-60)
for i=1, 100 do
    turn(-3)
end

turnTo(-60)
wait(1)
turnTo(0)

moveForward(1, 1)

moveForward(1, 1)
turnTo("frog")
moveForward(1, 1)

moveTo(19257,5,19174)
moveTo("mouse-pointer")
moveTo("@p")
moveTo("frog")

examples.desc: teleport to main player, mouse pointer, given actor
examples.code:
say("current player", 1)
moveTo("@p")
say("mouse-pointer", 1)
moveTo("mouse-pointer")
say("the frog actor if any", 1)
moveTo("frog")

turnTo(0)
walkForward(1)
turn(180)
walkForward(1, 0.5)

velocity("~ 10 ~")
wait(0.3)
velocity("add 2 ~ 2")
wait(2)
velocity("0 0 0")

turnTo(45)
while(true) do
    moveForward(0.02)
    if(isTouching("block")) then
        bounce()
    end
end

while(true) do
    say(getX())
end

while(true) do
    say(getY())
    if(getY()<3) then
        tip("Game Over!")
    end
end

while(true) do
    say(getZ())
end

local x, y, z = getPos()
setPos(x, y+0.5, z)

local x, y, z = getPos()
setPos(x, y+0.5, z)

while(true) do
    say(getFacing())
end

while(true) do
    say(math.random(1,100))
    wait(0.5)
end

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if(a==0) then
        say(a)
    elseif(a<=3) then
        say(a.."<=3")
    elseif(a>6) then
        say(a..">6")
    else
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    end
    wait(2)
end

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if(3<a and a<=6) then
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    else
        say(a)
    end
    wait(2)
end

examples.desc: Left or right meet the conditions
examples.code:
while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if(a<=3 or a>6) then
        say(a)
    else
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    end
    wait(2)
end

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10)
    if((not (3<=a)) or (not (a>6))) then
        say("3<"..a.."<=6")
    else
        say(a)
    end
    wait(2)
end
say("hello ".."world".."!!!")
say("length of hello is "..(#"hello"));

while(true) do
    a = math.random(0,10) / 10
    b = math.floor(a+0.5)
    say(a.."=>"..b)
    wait(2)
end

say("math.sqrt(9)=="..math.sqrt(9), 1)
say("math.cos(1)=="..math.cos(1), 1)
say("math.abs(-1)=="..math.abs(1), 1)

turnTo(45)
while(true) do
    moveForward(0.1)
    if(isTouching(62)) then
        say("grass block!", 1)
    elseif(isTouching("block")) then
        bounce()
    elseif(isTouching("box")) then
        bounce()
    end
end

examples.desc: 复制的对象也可有不同的名字
examples.code:
registerCloneEvent(function(name)
    setActorValue("name", name)
    moveForward(1);
end)
registerClickEvent(function()
    local myname = getActorValue("name")
    say("my name is "..myname)
end)
setActorValue("name", "Default")
clone("myself", "Cloned")
say("click us!")

cmd("/show boundingbox")
setBlock(getX(), getY()+2, getZ(), 62)
setActorValue("physicsRadius", 0.5)
setActorValue("physicsHeight", 2)
move(0, 0.2, 0)
if(isTouching("block")) then
    say("touched!", 1)
end
setBlock(getX(), getY()+2, getZ(), 0)
wait(2)
move(0, -0.2, 0)
cmd("/hide boundingbox")

cmd("/show boundingbox")
setBlock(getX(), getY()+2, getZ(), 62)
setActorValue("physicsRadius", 0.5)
setActorValue("physicsHeight", 2)
move(0, 0.2, 0)
if(isTouching("block")) then
    say("touched!", 1)
end
setBlock(getX(), getY()+2, getZ(), 0)
wait(2)
move(0, -0.2, 0)
cmd("/hide boundingbox")

while(true) do
    if(distanceTo("mouse-pointer") < 3) then
        say("mouse-pointer")
    elseif(distanceTo("@p") < 10) then
        say("player")
    elseif(distanceTo("@p") > 10) then
        say("nothing")
    end
    wait(0.01)
end

ask("what is your name")
say("hello "..tostring(answer), 2)

ask("select your choice", {"choice A", "choice B"})
if(answer == 1) then
    say("you choose A")
elseif(answer == 2) then
    say("you choose B")
end

run(function()
   wait(3)
   ask()
end)
ask("Please answer in 3 seconds")
say("hello "..tostring(answer), 2)

say("
Like A or B?
html are supported") ask("type A or B") if(answer == "A") then say("A is good", 2) elseif(answer == "B") then say("B is fine", 2) else say("i do not understand you", 2) end

say("press left/right key to move me!")
while(true) do
    if(isKeyPressed("left")) then
        move(0, 0.1)
        say("")
    elseif(isKeyPressed("right")) then
        move(0, -0.1)
        say("")
    end
    wait()
end

say("press any key to continue!")
while(true) do
    if(isKeyPressed("any")) then
        say("you pressed a key!", 2)
    end
    wait()
end

-- a,b,c,...z
-- 1,2,3,...9,0
-- f1,f2,...,f12,escape
-- space,left,right,up,down
-- numpad0,numpad1,...,numpad9
-- return,minus,equals,back,tab,
-- lcontrol,lshift,lmenu

say("click anywhere")
while(true) do
    if(isMouseDown()) then
        moveTo("mouse-pointer")
        wait(0.3)
    end
end

while(true) do
    local x, y, z, blockid = mousePickBlock();
    if(x) then
        say(format("%s %s %s :%d", x, y, z, blockid))
    end
end

local x,y,z = getPos()
local id = getBlock(x,y+2,z)
setBlock(x,y+2,z, 62)
wait(1)
-- 0 to delete block
setBlock(x,y+2,z, 0)
setBlock(x,y+2,z, id)

resetTimer()
while(getTimer()<5) do
    moveForward(0.02)
end

resetTimer()
while(getTimer()<2) do
    wait(0.5);
end
say("hi", 2)

while (true) do
    playNote("1", 0.5)
    playNote("2", 0.5)
    playNote("3", 0.5)
end

playMusic("2")
wait(5)
playMusic()

playSound("break")
wait(1)
playSound("click")
